quote: I wouldn't waste a day, not an hour, not a moment. Take what you want and damn caution. Live, enjoy. Feed ravenously. Or the biggest regret you'll have at the end of your life is wasted time.
quote_letters: I WOULDNT WASTE A DAY NOT AN HOUR NOT A MOMENT TAKE WHAT YOU WANT AND DAMN CAUTION LIVE ENJOY FEED RAVENOUSLY OR THE BIGGEST REGRET YOULL HAVE AT THE END OF YOUR LIFE IS WASTED TIME
